description.value:
Allows for a person to be placed inside and hooked up to a life support system, suspended in a thick curative solution. It halves the time required to Naturally Heal wounds, provides +10 to Toughness Tests to overcome the effects of poisons/disease and +20 to Medicae Tests to Diagnose a patient. Operating on a character inside requires Medicae and Tech-Use.

Effect: Rare

Notes: 7500 T
